content:
TypeValidationEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the TypeValidationCompleted event of the MaskedTextBox control.

In this Article

public delegate void TypeValidationEventHandler(object sender, TypeValidationEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
TypeValidationEventHandler

Remarks

The TypeValidationCompleted event of the MaskedTextBox class is an optional event that is raised only if the ValidatingType property is explicitly set to a type other than null.

Typically, a handler for the TypeValidationCompleted event is implemented to perform mask-specific and type-specific validation processing. In contrast, general validation is typically performed in the standard Validating event defined in the Control base class.
